quote: Although he too was heading to work, Shahid was glad he wasn't dragging himself off to some office job. Shahid's view: anybody who had to wear a suit to work died a little inside, every day.
quote_letters: ALTHOUGH HE TOO WAS HEADING TO WORK SHAHID WAS GLAD HE WASNT DRAGGING HIMSELF OFF TO SOME OFFICE JOB SHAHIDS VIEW ANYBODY WHO HAD TO WEAR A SUIT TO WORK DIED A LITTLE INSIDE EVERY DAY
